original_text: And must my sheep eat what you have trodden with your feet, and drink what you have muddied with your feet?
korean_text: 나의 양은 너희 발로 밟은 것을 먹으며 너희 발로 더럽힌 것을 마시는도다 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And must my sheep eat what you have trodden with your feet
sentences.korean_translation: 내 양들이 너희 발로 밟은 것을 먹어야만 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: and drink what you have muddied with your feet?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 발로 흐린 물을 마셔야만 하겠느냐?
